title: How to run gazebo integrated unit test

content.raw:
For quite awhile I have been wanting simulation in the loop unit tests with Gazebo. There are a ton of use cases for this, but right now I have a gazebo plugin that I want to unit test. Here's what i'm looking for essentially

- Each test can create a Gazebo instance with a model in a world
- Each test can manually tick the physics or set them to tick at some rate
- After the test, destroy Gazebo and move to the next test

I have looked through many of the unit tests written by the OSRF folks, and it's not immediately obvious to me how to make this happen, but I feel like it **has** to be possible.
